Record.ClassificationPath: Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Therapeutic Uses/Central Nervous System Agents/Anti-Dyskinesia Agents
Record.Description: Drugs used in the treatment of movement disorders. Most of these act centrally on dopaminergic or cholinergic systems. Among the most important clinically are those used for the treatment of Parkinson disease (ANTIPARKINSON AGENTS) and those for the tardive dyskinesias.
